sentences.sContent: I need the money. And besides, when I agree to do something, I do it.
sentences.sCn: 我需要这笔钱，而且，我一旦答应做什么事情就会做到。

sentences.sContent: I think she has many good qualities besides being very beautiful.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得她除了非常漂亮之外，还有许多好的品质。

trans.tranOther: in addition to someone or something else that you are mentioning
